title: Orgasmachine
description: "Naive, innocent, custom-built girls, and the shocks they encounter when they meet their buyers." This is the superb Signed, Numbered, Limited Edition (of only 100 copies) English-language first appearance of Watson's 1976 erotic novel The Woman Machine (first published then in French, then in 2001 in Japanese). The four-part novel is here followed by Watson's delightful, revelatory Afterword, then a few pages of Judy Watson illustrations, and concluding with an essay titled "Beware the Pedicating Tribads!" 208 pages.
author: Ian  Watson
